alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 12:12PM MST until November 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park and Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially over Teton and Togwotee Passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
